message: This is a rare opportunity to get a product at a fixed price of $10000. I'm confident that you'll find it useful, and I'm willing to take the risk of selling it to you without a trial period. What do you say? Will you take a chance on this product?
I'm not sure about the quality of the product, and I'd like to wait for more information before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to assure you that I'm willing to provide more information. In fact, I can tell you that this product has been used by many satisfied customers, and they've reported positive results. I'm willing to offer you a special deal: I'll throw in a free consultation to help you get the most out of this product. What do you think? Is this enough to convince you to take the plunge?

I appreciate the offer, but I'm still not convinced. The fact that many customers have reported positive results doesn't necessarily mean that this product is high-quality. I'd like to see more information or try a different approach before making a decision.
